title.native: ぷにるはかわいいスライム

description: The slime created by the boy Kotarou can transform into a super beautiful girl! Kotarou is constantly getting pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling antics. It's a joyful and exciting life every day!
hashtag: #ぷにるはかわいいスライム #ぷにる #ぷにかわ

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Cosplay
tags.description: Features dressing up as a different character or profession.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

node.description:
Freelance animator. 

*Not to be confused with the [ufotable animator](https://anilist.co/staff/309773) of the same name.*
**Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).
Miu Miyamoto is an art director and background artist.

[Profile (bransic)](https://bransic.net/composer_musician/izumi-mori) | [Twitter](https://x.com/mori_izumimi)

Izumi Mori is a Japanese composer, part of the musical duo *IZUMI SAKI*.
**Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).

__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Agency Profile](http://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=35) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/U_sshr)

Non-Anime Roles:
- Lynette (Genshin Impact)
- Verina (Wuthering Waves)
- Ulu (Reverse: 1999)

[Profile (bransic)](https://bransic.net/composer_musician/izumi-mori) | [Twitter](https://x.com/mori_izumimi)

Izumi Mori is a Japanese composer, part of the musical duo *IZUMI SAKI*.
